entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
